content: Hello. Are you interested in a special offer for new bathroom fixtures at unbeatable prices? Reply YES for more details.
This is XYZ Home Services. How can we assist you with your plumbing, electrical, or HVAC needs today?
Our supplier has authorized 50% off for the first 10 responders! Act now! Please send your address and phone number to claim.
It seems like this message may not be related to scheduling a home service appointment. If you are looking to book plumbing, electrical, or HVAC services, please let us know!
reason: Customer sent suspicious promotional messages unrelated to home services.
